name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. John F. HILL, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. John F. HILL, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of August, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
955 A.2d 349
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. John F. HILL, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 19, 2008.
